scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm.cmd run dev --prefix server" "npm.cmd run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps --production=false && npm run build --prefix frontend
